card.name: SW - CSI Person Report Data enhancement

data.text: @shaunviljoen the Property History from XDS is actually a Deeds Office search it seems. They don't have a specific Property History Module, only Deeds Data, maybe I am missing it. I wonder if they supply it with their offline DB? Then it will be cheaper.... Please can you find out more details? Maybe show them a Property History report and ask them if they can provide only that information? Then we can swap over.
